PERSON: SELECT ?predicateLabel ?objectLabel WHERE { wd:{entity_id} ?predicate ?object. ?property wikibase:directClaim ?predicate. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". ?property rdfs:label ?predicateLabel. ?object rdfs:label ?objectLabel. } FILTER (?predicate IN ( wdt:P569, wdt:P19, wdt:P570, wdt:P20, wdt:P106, wdt:P27, wdt:P21, wdt:P69, wdt:P26, wdt:P40 )) FILTER (LANG(?objectLabel) = "en" || !isLiteral(?object)) FILTER (!STRSTARTS(STR(?predicate), "http://schema.org/")) FILTER (!STRSTARTS(STR(?objectLabel), "http")) } LIMIT 15
ORG: SELECT ?predicateLabel ?objectLabel WHERE { wd:{entity_id} ?predicate ?object. ?property wikibase:directClaim ?predicate. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". ?property rdfs:label ?predicateLabel. ?object rdfs:label ?objectLabel. } FILTER (?predicate IN ( wdt:P571, wdt:P112, wdt:P159, wdt:P169, wdt:P452, wdt:P749, wdt:P1128, wdt:P2139 )) FILTER (LANG(?objectLabel) = "en" || !isLiteral(?object)) FILTER (!STRSTARTS(STR(?predicate), "http://schema.org/")) FILTER (!STRSTARTS(STR(?objectLabel), "http")) } LIMIT 15

SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". ?property rdfs:label ?predicateLabel. ?object rdfs:label ?objectLabel. } FILTER (?predicate IN ( wdt:P580, wdt:P582, wdt:P276, wdt:P710, wdt:P828, wdt:P1346 )) FILTER (LANG(?objectLabel) = "en" || !isLiteral(?object)) FILTER (!STRSTARTS(STR(?predicate), "http://schema.org/")) FILTER (!STRSTARTS(STR(?objectLabel), "http")) } LIMIT 15

DATE: SELECT ?predicateLabel ?objectLabel WHERE { wd:{entity_id} ?predicate ?object. ?property wikibase:directClaim ?predicate. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". ?property rdfs:label ?predicateLabel. ?object rdfs:label ?objectLabel. } FILTER (?predicate IN ( wdt:P793 )) FILTER (LANG(?objectLabel) = "en" || !isLiteral(?object)) FILTER (!STRSTARTS(STR(?predicate), "http://schema.org/")) FILTER (!STRSTARTS(STR(?objectLabel), "http")) } LIMIT 15
